title: Resource_Utilization_Metrics_V1_0_0
description: Schema for capturing forensic time-series resource utilization metrics (RUM), referenced by TEDS.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp for the metric reading.

cpu_load_percent.description: Average CPU utilization percentage over the sampling interval (0-100).

memory_usage_bytes.description: Total physical memory utilized in bytes.

iops.description: Combined disk Input/Output Operations Per Second.

description: A minimum of 5 time-series metric snapshots are required leading up to the failure event for effective analysis.
